item.title: 云行业游说团体称，欧盟反垄断监管机构批准 Broadcom 的 VMware 交易是错误的
item.description: 欧洲云基础设施服务供应商协会（CISPE）向欧洲第二最高法院表示，欧盟反垄断监管机构在批准博通公司（Broadcom）以 690 亿美元收购云计算公司 VMware 的交易之前，未能正确分析该交易的风险。【原文：EU antitrust regulators failed to analyse properly the risks of Broadcom's $69 billion acquisition of cloud computing firm VMware before clearing the deal, the Cloud Infrastructure Services Providers in Europe (CISPE) has told Europe's second-highest court.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数在季节性调整挑战下激增
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数激增，但这可能反映出在每年这个时候根据季节性波动调整数据存在困难，而不是劳动力市场状况发生了实质性变化。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits surged last week, but that likely reflected difficulties adjusting the data for seasonal fluctuations around this time of year, rather than a material change in labor market conditions.】

item.title: 人工智能架构师被评为《时代》"年度人物
item.description: 时代》杂志周四将人工智能的设计师们评为 "年度人物"，称他们有能力用变革性技术开创会思考的机器时代。【原文：Time magazine named the architects of artificial intelligence its "Person of the Year" on Thursday, citing their ability to deliver the age of thinking machines with transformative technology.】

item.title: 投资者兴趣高涨，Kalshi 和 Crypto.com 启动预测市场联盟
item.description: Kalshi和Crypto.com周四表示，他们已经发起了一个全国性的预测市场运营商联盟，其中包括加密货币交易所Coinbase、零售交易平台Robinhood和体育博彩运营商Underdog。【原文：Kalshi and Crypto.com said on Thursday they had launched a national alliance of prediction market operators that includes cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase , retail trading platform Robinhood and sports gaming operator Underdog.】

item.title: 独家报道卢克石油公司倾向于 Xtellus 公司以无现金方式竞购其海外资产
item.description: 俄罗斯卢克石油公司（Lukoil）的两位知情人士称，与十几家竞争对手相比，该公司更青睐美国银行 Xtellus Partners 对其全球资产的竞购，因为该竞购将采取无现金交易的形式，将美国持有的证券返还给这家俄罗斯石油公司。【原文：Russia's Lukoil favours U.S. bank Xtellus Partners' bid for its global assets over a dozen rival bids, as it takes the form of a cashless deal that would return U.S.-held securities to the Russian oil company, two sources familiar with the process said.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，贝森特将提议对金融稳定监督委员会进行重大改革
item.description: 据 CNBC 周四报道，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）将建议改变金融稳定监督委员会（Financial Stability Oversight Council）的工作方法。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent will recommend changing the approach of the Financial Stability Oversight Council, CNBC reported on Thursday.】

item.title: Altria 首席执行官比利-吉福德将于 5 月退休，首席财务官曼库索将接任
item.description: Altria 周四表示，自 2020 年以来一直领导这家烟草巨头的首席执行官比利-吉福德（Billy Gifford）将于 5 月退休，由财务主管萨尔瓦多-曼库索（Salvatore Mancuso）接任。【原文：Altria said on Thursday that CEO Billy Gifford, who has led the tobacco giant since 2020, would retire in May and be succeeded by finance head Salvatore Mancuso.】

item.title: 智利将截至 2034 年的矿业投资预测上调至 1,050 亿美元
item.description: 智利国营机构Cochilco周四表示，从今年到2034年，智利的矿业投资预计将达到1045.49亿美元，高于去年预计的到2033年约830亿美元。 Cochilco说，这一增长使支出预测达到2016年以来的最高水平。其中包括必和必拓（BHP）旗下世界最大铜矿埃斯孔迪达（Escondida）的大规模扩建计划。 智利是世界上最大的铜矿生产国和第二大锂矿生产国，锂是充电电池的关键成分。【原文：Chile's mining investment is expected to reach $104.549 billion from this year through 2034, state-run agency Cochilco said on Thursday, up from last year's estimate of about $83 billion through 2033. The increase brings the spending forecast to its highest level since 2016, Cochilco said. It includes plans for a major expansion at BHP's Escondida, the world's biggest copper mine. Chile is the world's largest producer of copper and second-largest of lithium, a key ingredient of rechargeable batteries.】

item.title: 星巴克工会将为期一个月的罢工扩大到更多城市
item.description: 星巴克工人工会周四表示，数百名新加入工会的咖啡师将离开他们在 34 个城市的工作岗位，加入自上个月开始不断升级的罢工。【原文：The Starbucks workers' union said on Thursday hundreds of new union baristas are walking out of their jobs in 34 cities, joining the strike which has been escalating since it began last month.】

item.title: 据 Business Insider 报道，亚马逊计划推出新的一小时店内取货服务
item.description: 据《商业内幕》周四援引一份内部文件和一位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，亚马逊正在开发一种 "急速 "取货服务，让顾客可以在一小时内从其商店取走订单。【原文：Amazon is developing a "rush" pickup service that would let customers collect orders from its stores within an hour, Business Insider reported on Thursday, citing an internal document and a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 曼联陷入亏损，欧战缺席影响收入
item.description: 本周四，曼彻斯特联队（Manchester United）出现第一季度净亏损，原因是本赛季俱乐部退出欧洲赛事，导致转播收入和门票销售额下降。【原文：Manchester United swung to a first-quarter net loss on Thursday, weighed by lower broadcasting revenue and ticket sales as the club sits out European competitions this season.】

item.title: 大型央行重回加息模式，但美联储继续减息
item.description: 大型经济体的央行正在发出改变立场的信号，许多央行在经历了漫长的宽松周期后，现在都按兵不动，而决策者们则表示，他们的下一步行动，假以时日，可能就是加息。【原文：Central banks in big economies are signaling a change of stance, with many now on hold after a long easing cycle, and policymakers flagging that their next moves, in time, could be rate hikes.】

item.title: TerraUSD 创始人杜权因 400 亿美元加密货币崩盘被判刑
item.description: 韩国加密货币企业家权斗（Do Kwon）是两个数字货币的幕后推手，这两个数字货币在 2022 年损失了约 400 亿美元，他将于周四在纽约联邦法院因欺诈和共谋罪被判刑。【原文：Do Kwon, the South Korean cryptocurrency entrepreneur behind two digital currencies that lost an estimated $40 billion in 2022, is set to be sentenced in New York federal court on Thursday for fraud and conspiracy.】

item.title: 早间竞标甲骨文搅局鲍威尔
item.description: 路透社《公开兴趣》责任编辑 Anna Szymanski 报道【原文：By Anna Szymanski, Editor in Charge, Reuters Open Interest】

item.title: MFE 的贝卢斯科尼赞成派拉蒙在流媒体大洗牌中竞购华纳兄弟
item.description: 欧洲广播公司 MFE-MediaForEurope 首席执行官皮埃尔-西尔维奥-贝卢斯科尼（Pier Silvio Berlusconi）表示，他更希望派拉蒙旗下的 Skydance 而不是 Netflix 成为华纳兄弟 Discovery 的买家，认为此举将促进流媒体行业的竞争。【原文：Pier Silvio Berlusconi, chief executive of European broadcaster MFE-MediaForEurope , said he would prefer Paramount’s Skydance rather than Netflix as a buyer for Warner Bros Discovery , arguing the move would boost competition in the streaming industry.】

item.title: 绊倒特朗普的 13 个字母的单词--危及共和党在国会的控制权
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对 "可负担性 "一词的反复嘲弄令共和党战略家们感到担忧，他们说，这种固执有可能削弱白宫向美国人保证生活成本的努力，而生活成本是明年国会选举中选民最关心的问题。【原文：President Donald Trump’s repeated mockery of the word “affordability” is worrying Republican strategists, who say the fixation risks undercutting White House efforts to reassure Americans about the cost of living - a top voter concern heading into next year’s congressional elections.】

item.title: 投资者称伊隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 首次公开募股将是 "史上最疯狂的 IPO
item.description: 有报道称，SpaceX 正在酝酿潜在的首次公开募股，这将有助于为埃隆-马斯克的火星雄心提供资金，并使这家火箭和卫星公司的估值超过 1 万亿美元，投资者对此表示欢迎。【原文：Investors welcomed reports that SpaceX was mulling a potential IPO that would help fund Elon Musk's Mars ambitions and value the rocket and satellite company at more than $1 trillion, as some have been waiting for years to buy into the company.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Serval 在红杉领投的新一轮融资后估值达 10 亿美元，以拓展 IT 自动化业务
item.description: 人工智能驱动的IT支持初创公司Serval告诉路透社，该公司在红杉领投的B轮融资中筹集了7500万美元，在上一轮融资后仅三个月就实现了10亿美元的估值。【原文：AI-powered IT support startup Serval has raised $75 million in a Series B funding round led by Sequoia, achieving a $1 billion valuation just three months after its previous funding round, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 巴菲特将把伯克希尔的接力棒交给阿贝尔，后者将面临严峻考验
item.description: 六十年来，沃伦-巴菲特一直是伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）的代表人物，他建立了一个拥有众多股东粉丝的强大企业集团，使自己成为世界上最受尊敬的投资者。【原文：Warren Buffett has embodied Berkshire Hathaway for six decades, building a mighty conglomerate with a bevy of shareholder fans and making himself arguably the world's most revered investor.】

item.title: 甲骨文预测引发人工智能泡沫担忧，华尔街期货下滑
item.description: 甲骨文公司的预测引发了人们对人工智能巨额支出的新忧虑，并且抵消了美联储鹰派基调减弱后的乐观情绪，导致美国股指期货周四下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures tumbled on Thursday after Oracle's forecasts raised fresh concerns about hefty AI spending and outweighed optimism following a less hawkish tone from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 独家报道人工智能软件初创公司 Harness 在最新一轮融资中估值 55 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能软件开发初创公司 Harness 周四表示，该公司在高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）主导的一轮融资中筹集了 2 亿美元，估值达 55 亿美元。【原文：Harness, an AI software development startup, has raised $200 million in a Goldman Sachs-led fundraising round that values it at $5.5 billion, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道：普拉达将推出价值 930 美元的 "印度制造 "凉鞋
item.description: 普拉达高级主管洛伦佐-贝尔泰利（Lorenzo Bertelli）告诉路透社记者，普拉达将在印度生产一个限量版凉鞋系列，灵感来自该国的传统鞋履，每双售价约 800 欧元（930 美元），将文化挪用的反弹转化为与印度工匠的合作。【原文：Prada will make a limited-edition collection of sandals in India inspired by the country's traditional footwear, selling each pair at around 800 euros ($930), Prada senior executive Lorenzo Bertelli told Reuters, turning a backlash over cultural appropriation into a collaboration with Indian artisans.】

item.title: 独家报道墨西哥加征关税将打击 10 亿美元的印度汽车出口，尽管汽车制造商进行了游说
item.description: 据路透社查阅的两位消息人士和一份行业组织的信函称，墨西哥决定将关税提高至 50%，这将影响到包括大众和现代在内的印度主要汽车出口商价值 10 亿美元的货物，尽管该行业曾游说新德里阻止这一举动。【原文：Mexico's decision to raise tariffs as high as 50% will affect $1 billion worth of shipments from major Indian car exporters, including Volkswagen and Hyundai, despite industry lobbying to persuade New Delhi to prevent such a move, according to two sources and a letter from an industry group reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 中国称与欧盟恢复电动汽车最低价格计划谈判
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，与欧盟就中国产电动汽车最低价格计划的谈判已经重启，并将持续到下周，同时敦促欧盟不要单独与制造商谈判。【原文：China's commerce ministry on Thursday said negotiations with the European Union over a minimum price plan for China-made electric vehicles have restarted and would continue into next week, while urging the bloc not to talk independently with manufacturers.】

item.title: 美国监管机构称Waymo召回、更新3000多辆汽车的软件
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周四表示，Alphabet 旗下公司 Waymo 因软件问题在美国召回了 3067 辆汽车，该问题已通过更新得到解决。【原文：Alphabet unit Waymo recalled 3,067 of its vehicles in the United States over a software issue which was fixed through an update, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Thursday.】

item.title: 越南三星中枢的美国手机进口量创 2020 年以来最低水平
item.description: 越南官方数据显示，由于以三星电子为首的出口商面临贸易不确定性和消费需求放缓，11 月份美国从越南（其主要供应商之一）进口的电话及其零部件降至五年多来的最低水平。【原文：U.S. imports of telephones and parts from Vietnam, one of its top suppliers, fell to their lowest levels in more than five years in November, according to official Vietnamese data, as exporters led by Samsung Electronics faced trade uncertainties and slowing consumer demand.】

item.title: 尽管美联储持谨慎态度，但券商仍坚持美国降息预期
item.description: 大多数全球券商预测，美国联邦储备委员会将在 2026 年的两次降息中累计降低利率 50 个基点，重申了他们此前的立场，即使该央行表示近期不太可能降息。【原文：Most global brokerages predict the U.S. Federal Reserve will reduce interest rates by a cumulative 50 basis points over two cuts in 2026, reiterating their earlier position even as the central bank indicated that near-term cuts were unlikely.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因科技股估值担忧创近六年来最大外资流出量
item.description: 11 月份，亚洲股市出现了近六年来最大的单月外资流出，主要原因是投资者对估值过高的担忧促使科技股下挫，从而减少了投资。【原文：Asian equities witnessed their largest monthly foreign outflows in nearly six years in November, driven by a selloff in high-flying technology stocks as concerns over stretched valuations prompted investors to cut exposure.】

item.title: 贝莱德的 Chiguchi 称，日本市场面临通胀加速的 "落后 "利率风险
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）日本首席投资策略师Yuichi Chiguchi表示，如果央行发现自己在抑制通胀方面 "落后于曲线"，明年日本市场可能会受到冲击。【原文：Japanese markets could be jolted next year if the central bank finds itself "behind the curve" in taming inflation, according to BlackRock Japan’s chief investment strategist Yuichi Chiguchi.】

item.title: 韩国 SK On 与福特汽车将终止美国电池合资企业
item.description: 韩国电池制造商 SK On 周四表示，已决定终止与福特汽车在美国的两家合资电池厂。【原文：South Korean battery maker SK On said on Thursday that it has decided to end its joint venture with Ford Motor for their two joint battery factories in the United States.】
